g.text: Ho my god a health fontain! Glou Glou Glou! (health +30)

b.text: What the hell is that! A balrogue Level 42! Run away! RUN YOU FOOLS!

B.text: You found a balrogue Level 42! I hope you won't suffer too much before dying.

m.text: You said labyrinth? And what is there in a la labyrinth? A tip: It is an hybrid between cow and a human.

M.text: Le wild minotaure appears. Minotaure uses Sodomy and it's very effective. (health -20)
